ProductInfo.Features:
Stay in touch with friends, family and colleagues with one smart device: the blackberry 9790 bold smartphone. It combines several functions, including an electronic diary, sat nav and 5-megapixel camera, and operates on blackberry os 7. The 2.45" tft lcd landscape screen is handy for reading email and checking out the blackberry app world.this model integrates excellent connectivity, including wifi and bluetooth 2.1 for hands-free communication.that's not all though. The 9790 bold also includes
A media player to enjoy mp3 and mpeg files, which you can store on the 8 gb internal memory or on a micro sd card.
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry 9790
